title: Not easily swayed
excerpt: Creating a relationship with someone who likes you for many reasons other than your good looks or money is a great way to build a relationship that lasts.

children.text: Creating a relationship with someone who likes you for many reasons other than your good looks or money is a great way to build a relationship that lasts.
And investing in assets that aren’t as volatile as others is a great way to accrue interest on things you
be tempted to back out of.
Good things come to those who wait.
Which is to say, things not easily neglected.
